skillTree.localised_description: As the Perfect Prince's dark influence increases, so too do the blessings of His pleasure.
Slaanesh's favoured child has been granted the gift of preternatural swordsmanship.

effects.description:
Enables Soporific Musk attacks for Aspiring Champions and Chosen of Slaanesh
	(Lord's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +4 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh and Chosen of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The beatific Mark of Slaanesh is branded into Sigvald's perfect body.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh and Chosen of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
This oneâ€™s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Being unable to contemplate anything other than their own perverse needs and desires would be a handicap for anyone else, but not so Sigvald the Magnificent.
"I know, I know - I truly am a perfect specimen. Hold the mirror a bit higherâ€¦ higher! Yes that's rightâ€¦"
"What think you of this particular suit of armour? I think the gold really captures my best aspects - all of them hahahaha!"
Sigvald inspires fanatical devotion in his followers, for they know that in the aftermath of battle they may sate their most unholy lusts without restraint.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain: +15% for Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Sigvald's sycophantic minions will do anything to stay in his favour, not realising that he cares for none but himself and the attention of the Dark Prince, Slaanesh.

effects.description:
Attribute: Expendable for all non-character units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: On sight of Sigvald's undeniable magnificence the enemy must confront their own obvious inadequacies, and despair.
Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
A Chaos Lord dominates â€“ lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

skillTree.localised_description: Few could resist such sultry wiles, drawing so many to corruption's insidious grasp.

factionEffects.localised_description: Though he appears to be little more than sixteen summers of age, Sigvald the Magnificent has blighted the world for over three hundred years; the personification of beauty on the outside, but rot within.
